name: American Wings Flight Academy
about: American Winds Flight Academy, located at Akron Fulton Airport in Ohio, is a nationally accredited vocational flight training school dedicated to providing personalized and comprehensive aviation training. Founded in 2007, the academy is SEVIS and TSA certified, allowing it to issue I-20s for international students. It offers a "Fast Track" training program that includes both Part 61 and Part 141 competencies, ensuring students meet all FAA requirements. With a focus on safety, hard work, and professionalism, American Winds provides affordable and flexible training options, including an Associate Degree in Applied Science of Aeronautics. The academy maintains a fleet of 11 planes and a state-of-the-art flight simulator, ensuring a safe and effective learning environment. American Winds is committed to making your flying experience outstanding, each and every time.
